thread.title: The Real Estate Workshops Now Offering Exclusive Perks With Membership to Their Mentoring Program!
thread.title_full: The Real Estate Workshops Now Offering Exclusive Perks With Membership to Their Mentoring Program!

author: prbuzz.com
title: The Real Estate Workshops Now Offering Exclusive Perks With Membership to Their Mentoring Program!
text:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE:
August 19th, 2015
For more information, contact:
12760 S. Park Ave. #1315
Riverton, UT 84065
877-901-1167
http://therealestateworkshops.com
Riverton, Utah - (August 19th, 2015) ­– The Real Estate Workshop group is comprised of over 50 different real estate investors that have been investing for over 30 years all across the country. They have trained thousands of people from all walks of life how to buy real estate. REW is built around having a great team in place to help you reach your investment goals and live your dreams. They have offices in Salt Lake City and the San Diego areas, and they have real estate mentors that train people in all the major cities in the United States and Canada. The Real Estate Workshop group is now offering mentoring and advice for real estate professionals. If you are ready to make your real estate dreams a reality, our proven and qualified instructors will show you how. Even if real estate isn’t something you ever thought you would end up doing, many people turn to it near the age of retirement to sustain much needed income in a profession that is a lot more at YOUR pace than someone else’s. Real estate is a great field and no matter what got you into it, The Real Estate Workshops will be sure to make sure you succeed at it. As a student in REW's real estate program you will have unlimited access when working with their highly skilled instructors. They are available M-F 8am-8pm by phone or email to answer any type of question you can throw at them. Their instructor staff has over 50 years of real estate experience combined and over 75 years of hands on real estate investing. Their expert instructors will shorten the learning curve and focus your attention and training on using their tested techniques that produce results. Failure is simply not an option with this dedicated team of instructors at your side. Student financial independence is what they strive for as instructors of REW. As they work with their students to accomplish their dreams and aspirations it is incredibly inspiring and motivating to see all the hard work pay off when they get that first paycheck. They know that when you implement REW ’s proven techniques and skills YOU will be successful.
